text:
when I try to start tomcat3.3 server on Win NT following error is displaying 
in  my m/c.
A nonfatal internal JIT (3.00.078(x)) error 'Relocation error: NULL relocation 
t arget' has occurred in : 'org/apache/crimson/parser/Parser2.maybeComment (Z)
Z': Interpreting method. Please report this error in detail to 
http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi
creator: nagesh@iicindia.com

text:
Don't mean to be sarcastic, but here is the answer:

Please report this error in detail to http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi

This is a JIT bug.
creator: bojan@binarix.com
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
I believe this only occurs with JDK1.2.x and earlier.  It is related to
crimson.jar, not Tomcat 3.3 specifically.  This error goes away if you upgrade
to JDK 1.3 or later.
